name: node-hubspot
description: A node.js wrapper for the Hubspot API.

scripts.bump: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release-notes: git log --oneline --grep='Merge pull' `git describe --abbrev=0 --tags \`git describe --abbrev=0 \`^`...`git describe --abbrev=0`
